title: Magic Tiles 3
summary: Fast-paced mobile rhythm game with millions of downloads worldwide.
description:
Magic Tiles 3 is a fast-paced mobile rhythm game where players tap falling tiles in sync with music to build combos, chase high scores, and unlock new songs.

I worked on player-facing features and live-ops improvements, focusing on UI/UX polish, performance, and reliable event/analytics instrumentation.
responsibilities: Owned the end-to-end implementation of multiple UI-driven features (menus, progression, events) using Unity UI workflows and reusable UI components.
Improved runtime performance and stability by optimizing UI rendering, memory usage, and asset loading patterns for mid/low-end devices.
Implemented and maintained analytics events and experiment hooks to support product iteration and measure feature impact.
Collaborated with product, designers, QA, and backend teams to ship updates safely, validate edge cases, and ensure smooth live operations.
